import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Orders = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [orders, setOrders] = useState([ { id: "6asd45sa", } ]); return ( <>
New Order

{message}

All Orders

{orders.length > 0 ? orders.map(order => (

Customer Name: {`${order.customer_name} ${order.customer_surname}`}

{order.order_start_time &&

Order Start Date: {order.order_start_time.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "numeric", year: "numeric", day: "numeric" })}

}

Order Status: {order.order_status}

View
)) : (

No orders available.

)}
) } export default Orders
